All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class OptionsWindow
extends javax.swing.JDialog

An OptionsWindow class represents the options window of the application. The options window contains interactive graphical components that allow the user to setup or change the default settings of the application.

See Also:
Serialized Form
